hotels.title: India Escape with Outdoor Pool Overlooking Panoramic City Views
hotels.description: Discover an elegant Indian escape in the heart of the city with a lavish stay at Crowne Plaza Ahmedabad City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Soak in the history of the city as you discover the unique architectural variations, from the centuries-old to the modern cutting-edge design. You will discover amazement down each street as you experience the wonderous museums and delicious street foods, before returning to the blissful hotel pool to take a reprieve from the glorious sunshine.
